name: progress-whatsup-gold
label: Progress WhatsUp Gold
description: WhatsUp Gold provides complete visibility into the status and performance of applications, network devices and servers in the cloud or on-premises.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: resource
fields.tooltip: The service-based URI to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: The service-based URI to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.tooltip: Username to access the WhatsUp Gold server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Username to access the WhatsUp Gold server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.tooltip: Password to access the WhatsUp Gold server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Password to access the WhatsUp Gold server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Device Attributes
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all attributes for device from WhatsUp Gold based on the device ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify a device ID to retrieve its attributes from the WhatsUp Gold server.
parameters.description: Specify a device ID to retrieve its attributes from the WhatsUp Gold server.

parameters.title: Attribute Names
parameters.name: names
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated list of attribute names to return. If empty, all attributes will be returned.
parameters.description: Specify the comma-separated list of attribute names to return. If empty, all attributes will be returned.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The number of result to retrieve.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of records that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Page ID
parameters.name: pageId
parameters.tooltip: Used to get the next set of results. If nextPageId is returned in the previous response, you use the returned nextPageId value to get the next set of records.
parameters.description: Specify page ID to get the next set of results. If nextPageId is returned in the previous response, you use the returned nextPageId value to get the next set of records.

operations.title: Get Device Groups
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all device group assignments for a device from WhatsUp Gold based on the device ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify a device ID to retrieve its device group assignments from the WhatsUp Gold server.
parameters.description: Specify a device ID to retrieve its device group assignments from the WhatsUp Gold server.

parameters.title: View
parameters.name: view
parameters.tooltip: Specify to return a detailed or summarised response. Valid values: "ID" "Summary"(default) "Detail"
parameters.description: Specify to return a detailed or summarised response. Valid values: "ID" "Summary"(default) "Detail"

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The number of result to retrieve.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of records that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Page ID
parameters.name: pageId
parameters.tooltip: Used to get the next set of results. If nextPageId is returned in the previous response, you use the returned nextPageId value to get the next set of records.
parameters.description: Specify page ID to get the next set of results. If nextPageId is returned in the previous response, you use the returned nextPageId value to get the next set of records.

operations.title: Get Device Monitors
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all assigned monitors for a device from WhatsUp Gold based on the device ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify a device ID to retrieve its assigned monitors from the WhatsUp Gold server.
parameters.description: Specify a device ID to retrieve its assigned monitors from the WhatsUp Gold server.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The number of result to retrieve.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of records that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Page ID
parameters.name: pageId
parameters.tooltip: Used to get the next set of results. If nextPageId is returned in the previous response, you use the returned nextPageId value to get the next set of records.
parameters.description: Specify page ID to get the next set of results. If nextPageId is returned in the previous response, you use the returned nextPageId value to get the next set of records.

operations.title: Get Device Polling Configuration
operations.description: Retrieves the device general polling configuration summary from WhatsUp Gold based on the device ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify a device ID to retrieve its general polling configuration from the WhatsUp Gold server.
parameters.description: Specify a device ID to retrieve its general polling configuration from the WhatsUp Gold server.

operations.title: Get Device Summary
operations.description: Retrieves the summary of the device's configuration settings including references to credentials, monitors, groups, etc. from WhatsUp Gold based on the device ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify a device ID to retrieve its summary from the WhatsUp Gold server.
parameters.description: Specify a device ID to retrieve its summary from the WhatsUp Gold server.

operations.title: Get Device Overview
operations.description: Retrieves the device overview from WhatsUp Gold based on the device ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify a device ID to retrieve device overview from the WhatsUp Gold server.
parameters.description: Specify a device ID to retrieve device overview from the WhatsUp Gold server.

operations.title: Get Device Report
operations.description: Retrieves the report for a device from WhatsUp Gold based on the report type and device ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Report Type
parameters.name: report_type
parameters.tooltip: Specify a report type to retrieve for a device from the WhatsUp Gold server.
parameters.description: Specify a report type to retrieve for a device from the WhatsUp Gold server.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify a device ID to retrieve device report from the WhatsUp Gold server.
parameters.description: Specify a device ID to retrieve device report from the WhatsUp Gold server.

parameters.title: Range
parameters.name: range

lastNSeconds.title: Range N
lastNSeconds.description: Specify to return data gathered in the last N seconds.
lastNSeconds.name: rangeN
lastNSeconds.tooltip: Specify to return data gathered in the last N seconds.

lastNMinutes.title: Range N
lastNMinutes.description: Specify to return data gathered in the last N minutes.

lastNMinutes.tooltip: Specify to return data gathered in the last N minutes.

lastNHours.title: Range N
lastNHours.description: Specify to return data gathered in the last N hours.

lastNHours.tooltip: Specify to return data gathered in the last N hours.

lastNDays.title: Range N
lastNDays.description: Specify to return data gathered in the last N days.
lastNDays.name: rangeN
lastNDays.tooltip: Specify to return data gathered in the last N days.

lastNWeeks.title: Range N
lastNWeeks.description: Specify to return data gathered in the last N weeks.
lastNWeeks.name: rangeN
lastNWeeks.tooltip: Specify to return data gathered in the last N weeks.

lastNMonths.title: Range N
lastNMonths.description: Specify to return data gathered in the last N months.
lastNMonths.name: rangeN
lastNMonths.tooltip: Specify to return data gathered in the last N months.

custom.title: Start
custom.description: Specify the start date to retrieve the report from WhatsUp Gold.
custom.name: rangeStartUtc
custom.tooltip: Specify the start date to retrieve the report from WhatsUp Gold.

custom.title: End
custom.description: Specify the end date to retrieve the report from WhatsUp Gold.
custom.name: rangeEndUtc
custom.tooltip: Specify the end date to retrieve the report from WhatsUp Gold.

parameters.tooltip: Specify a range to filter the report retrieved from WhatsUp Gold.
parameters.description: Specify a range to filter the report retrieved from WhatsUp Gold.
